text: is a Japanese fighting manga written and illustrated by Hirakawa Tetsuhiro. == Media == === Manga === The first Clover volume was released on August 8, 2007, and the final 43 volume on October 15, 2015.http://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2015-10-11/hirakawa-clover-manga-to- end-on-october-15/.93914 ==References== ==External links== * Category:Akita Shoten manga Category:Shōnen manga Category:Yankī anime and manga
title: Clover (Tetsuhiro Hirakawa)
